message:
SYSTEM: NeOn_2007_D5.3.1.pdf: Página 7
D5.3.1 NeOn Development Process and Ontology Life Cycle 
Page 7 of 111 
The  third chapter of the deliverable identifies and describes 8 scenarios for collaboratively building 
network of ontologies with special emphasis in reusing and reengineering knowledge resources 
(ontological and non ontological) and in merging ontologies. 
The fourth chapter defines and describes several ontology network life cycle models, according to 
those models defined in the Software Engineering field; it also provides guidelines for obtaining the 
concrete life cycle for an ontology network. 
Finally, the fifth chapter describes the ontology network life cycle for the three NeOn use cases 
(fisheries, invoicing and nomenclator). 
Other essential methodological points such as methods, techniques and tools will be described in 
D5.4.1 (NeOn methodology for building contextualized networked ontologies) at M24.
